title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Allotment Cottage Pie
summary: There’s a reason classic cottage pie is a family favourite – rich meaty sauce made with beef, carrots and red wine topped with fluffy, cheesy mash is a wonderful combination.

title: Ultimate omelette Arnold Bennett
summary: The omelette provides a base for smoked haddock, cheese and a rich hollandaise, grilled until golden. A great centrepiece for a celebratory brunch.

title: Trout, spring onion and wild garlic quiche
summary: Wild garlic gives this creamy quiche a delicate fragrance that lifts the oily trout beautifully.
